name: Monopoly Layer2 DUO
description: What is the project about? Monopoly Finance is one and only layered yield farming on Arbitrum. What makes your project unique? Each layer has unique tokenomics and utilities of the native tokens. History of your project. Inherited its mechanism and features of HoneyFarm Finance, a sister project by same team, Arkhe Finance. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Acquiring more utilities and features that native tokens can be used and burnt to decrease circulation and increase value What can your token be used for? DUO can be used for farming currently, and will be used for IDO, Lottery, autocompounding and so on later on
